word: The worshipers of God will be especially distinguished by their regard for the fourth commandment\97since this is the sign of His creative power, and the witness to His claim upon man\92s reverence and homage. The wicked will be distinguished by their efforts to tear down the Creator\92s memorial, to exalt the institution of Rome. In the issue of the contest, all Christendom will be divided into two great classes\97those who keep the commandments of God and the faith of Jesus, and those who worship the beast and his image and receive his mark. . . .
